name: InstallShield Express Project File
summary: Learn about .ISE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: InstallShield project files created by the Premiere and Professional editions are saved as .ISM files.

description: Project file created by InstallShield Express, a program that allows users to create Windows installers; contains project settings and code, including installation file names, target locations, and dialog settings; used to build an installation package.
